f6932d54-ae89-47cb-ba7f-0f95cd3176e0.name: Combat Reflexes
f6932d54-ae89-47cb-ba7f-0f95cd3176e0.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

39f2c66c-25ef-4fbe-9d52-cf9cadc8385f.name: Luck
39f2c66c-25ef-4fbe-9d52-cf9cadc8385f.notes: Usable once per hour of play

ea8ffe80-ec8e-409c-94e0-594a55ab019a.name: Easy to Hit
ea8ffe80-ec8e-409c-94e0-594a55ab019a.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

068b8fbb-edba-49c2-a2c8-1ea55062aa6c.name: Single-Minded
068b8fbb-edba-49c2-a2c8-1ea55062aa6c.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident
toward any stranger and any “legitimate” reaction penalty (e.g., for an unfriendly race or nationality) is doubled

b9cb4f33-49dc-4f6e-bbcf-e105503ac3fd.name: Curious
b9cb4f33-49dc-4f6e-bbcf-e105503ac3fd.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

80f777c6-7284-4290-9b8e-640612c96fd1.name: Callous
80f777c6-7284-4290-9b8e-640612c96fd1.notes: +1 to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy

efc32df2-81c5-49a8-8d61-dd44830e57d7.name: Impulsiveness
efc32df2-81c5-49a8-8d61-dd44830e57d7.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

d6b37df0-9511-4936-a574-12128b39fae7.name: Kleptomania
d6b37df0-9511-4936-a574-12128b39fae7.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you are presented with a chance to steal, at up to -3 if the item is especially interesting to you (not necessarily valuable, unless you are poor or have Greed). If you fail, you must try to steal it. You may keep or sell stolen items, but you may not return or discard them.

33dd93d8-88d1-40f4-b1ed-73fee327286c.name: Lecherousness
33dd93d8-88d1-40f4-b1ed-73fee327286c.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have more than the briefest contact with an appealing member of the sex you find attractive, at -5 if this person is Handsome/Beautiful, or at -10 if Very Handsome/Very Beautiful. If you fail, you must make a “pass” using whatever wiles and skills you can bring to bear.

40a03378-621a-4dbd-9fff-bd5e403c70e3.name: Loner
40a03378-621a-4dbd-9fff-bd5e403c70e3.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

aad8b46e-d4f8-49bb-823b-a4b36cdf28d1.name: Post-Combat Shakes
aad8b46e-d4f8-49bb-823b-a4b36cdf28d1.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

1ac2b04d-a703-49d4-8418-9d53a4b622e4.name: Selfish
1ac2b04d-a703-49d4-8418-9d53a4b622e4.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

c4d0a7af-6d7c-491d-a682-13dca28d62f3.name: Judo
c4d0a7af-6d7c-491d-a682-13dca28d62f3.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.
